name: Aztec Cat Burglar 3D: Mega Jungle Run Uber Fun Tiger Adventure - By Dead Cool Games
name_original: Aztec Cat Burglar 3D: Mega Jungle Run Uber Fun Tiger Adventure - By Dead Cool Games
description:
*** Play the most EPIC RUNNER game on the App Store ***

You are 'Cat Burglar' a loveable jungle thief who just loves
collecting Gems. But BEWARE the cops are on your tail!

> RUN, JUMP and ROLL to escape - don't get busted
> Avoid TRAPS like barbed wire, fallen trees and rocks
> Awesome multiplier POWER-UPS to help you

How long can you stay out of jungle jail?

FEATURES:

> Amazing 3D graphics
> Thrilling gameplay
> Easy, intuitive controls
> Loads of achievements to unlock

Download NOW 100% FREE!
